description:
Frost shouldn’t keep you from your run. When the ground starts to crunch underfoot, the Frost Cold Weather ½ zip is there to keep you on your training plan. With smooth, water and wind resistant outer layer and fleecy, brushed inner layer, this ½ zip shows its hard side to the elements, while keeping its soft side for you. Reflective details on the sleeves and back add a little safety on short days where running before work, or after, means running in the dark.

  • Poly blend wicks away moisture, traps your hard earned warmth, and has a 4-way stretch
  • ½ zip makes venting easy and lets you keep your toque on when changing
  • Zippered pockets keep essentials secure and give your hands a place to escape the cold
  • Reflective details help keep you seen
  • Slim athletic fit
  • Certified B Corporation: certified to meet the highest standards of social and environmental impact
name: MPG Frost Mixed Media Cold Weather 1/2 Zip Top - Men's
